name: Idol With a Sister Complex, Nodoka Toyohama
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is an 《Adolescence》 character, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage.

name: On Housewatch, Kaede Azusagawa
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax revealed amongst those cards, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 during battle, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 level 1 or lower character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Mai-san is so awesome!

name: Pent-Up Feelings, Nodoka Toyohama
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Sister Panic" is in your climax area, and you have another 《Adolescence》 character, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Adolescence》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] When this card is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 1 "Runaway, Nodoka Toyohama" from your hand, and put it on the stage position that this card was on as the defending character.
flavorText: But I'm not... her real little sister!

name: Talented Individual, Mai Sakurajima
text: 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may put this card into your memory. If you do, at the beginning of your next draw phase, choose 1 "Talented Individual, Mai Sakurajima" in your memory, and put it on any position of your stage.
flavorText: There's a kissing scene, too.

name: Surfaced Feelings, Mai Sakurajima
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters with level higher than your opponent's level, and put it into your opponent's waiting room. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Any thoughts?

name: Sunset Sky, Mai Sakurajima
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have 4 or more other 《Adolescence》 characters, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power and +1 soul until end of turn. 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if the damage dealt by this card is canceled, you may deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)

name: Brother Complex, Kaede Azusagawa
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw up to 2 cards, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 Experience [(2) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] At the end of this card's attack, if "The Kaede Quest" is in your climax area, and the total level of cards in your level is 6 or higher, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Courage to Move On, Kaede Azusagawa" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavorText: Kaede is the only little sister for Big Brother!

name: Longing and Respect, Nodoka Toyohama
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 Change [Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Schooling High School Idol, Nodoka Toyohama" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavorText: Sakuta: "It became painfully obvious to her..."

name: Indoors Preference, Kaede Azusagawa
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1)] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, perform the following action. "Choose 1 《Adolescence》 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room."

name: First Steps, Kaede Azusagawa
text: 【AUTO】 [(2) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 2 《Adolescence》 characters, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, shuffle your deck, and this card gets +3000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I'm not alone anymore.

name: Sisterly Thoughts, Nodoka Toyohama
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, all of your other characters with "Mai (麻衣)" or "Nodoka (のどか)" in its card name get +1000 power. 【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 this card] Choose 1 character in your waiting room with "Mai (麻衣)" or "Nodoka (のどか)" in its card name, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: I'll casually ask Big Sister where she is for you!

name: Press Interview, Mai Sakurajima
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 0 or lower, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn. Otherwise, draw up to 1 card, choose 1 card in your hand, put it into your waiting room, and this card gets +1000 power until end of turn. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: I would ask that you refrain from invading his privacy, if possible.

name: A Strong Impact, Mai Sakurajima
text: 【CONT】 If you do not have another 《Adolescence》 character, this card cannot 【STAND】 during your stand phase. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: No, that's your libido!

name: Awkward Kindness, Sakuta Azusagawa
text: 【CONT】 Your other 《Adolescence》 character in the middle position of the center stage gets +1500 power. 【AUTO】 When this card direct attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Adolescence》 characters, and that character gets +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: I could fill myself up three times over with the sound of the shower alone.

name: Complex Feelings, Mai Sakurajima
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When damage dealt by this card is canceled, if "A Shot to the Heart" is in your climax area, you may choose 1 《Adolescence》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: I wish you told us a bit earlier.

name: Embarassed, Mai Sakurajima
text: 【AUTO】 When your other 《Adolescence》 character attacks, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: You're embarrassing me. Stop!

name: Secret of Lost Memories, Mai Sakurajima
flavorText: What's going on?

name: Crisis as a Sister, Kaede Azusagawa
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you cannot use "【AUTO】 Encore" until end of turn. (You cannot use the "【AUTO】 Encore [(3)]" rule either)
flavorText: Right now, Kaede is in the biggest crisis in the history of Kaede!

name: Announcer, Fumika Nanjo
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each character on your opponent's back stage. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Adolescence》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: It's been a while.

name: Courage to Move On, Kaede Azusagawa
text: 【CONT】 Experience If the total level of cards in your level is 4 or higher, this card gets +2500 power. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《Adolescence》 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is placed into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: Big Brother, this is…

name: Panda Pajamas
text: Experience If the total level of cards in your level is 3 or higher, choose up to 2 characters in your waiting room, return them to your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, put it into your waiting room, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Mai: "Why don't you try it on?"

name: Secret Treasure
text: 【COUNTER】 Search your deck for up to 2 characters with "Mai (麻衣)" or "Nodoka (のどか)" in its card name, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, put it into your waiting room, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Mai: "Don't look through people's treasures without permission."

name: A Shot to the Heart
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.

name: Sister Panic
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【RETURN】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to his or her hand)
flavorText: Mai: "Then, from now on, make her happy with something you choose for yourself, Nodoka."

name: The Kaede Quest
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【SHOT】: During this turn, when the next damage dealt by the attacking character that triggered this card is canceled, deal 1 damage to your opponent)
flavorText: Kaede would like to try going outside now.

name: Dreaming Girl, Shoko Makinohara
text: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 2 or less climax, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 During your turn, if all of your characters are 《Adolescence》, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
flavorText: That sadness is another precious thing that Kaede has given you.

name: Observation Theory, Rio Futaba
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Adolescence》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into your opponent's waiting room. If you do, put that character into his or her clock.
flavorText: Even if that wasn't the case, atmospheres can easily spread.

name: Clear Blue Skies, Tomoe Koga
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, choose 1 of your 《Adolescence》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over the top 4 cards of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, perform the following action. "Choose 1 card in your clock, return it to your hand, and put the top card of your deck into your clock."

name: Phantom Elder Sister, Shoko Makinohara
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax revealed among those cards, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Adolscence》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Yes, it's me, Shoko-san.

name: Sunset Sky, Shoko Makinohara
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if you have an 《Adolescence》 character, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1000, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn)

name: Sunset Sky, Rio Futaba
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1 level and +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Adolescence》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Adolescence》 characters you have ×500.

name: Cool and Collected, Rio Futaba
text: 【CONT】 If this card is in the middle position of your center stage, this card gets +4000 power. 【CONT】 If your level is 3 or higher, this card gets "【CONT】 Great Performance". 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: I hear you're head-over-heels for Sakurajima-senpai lately.

name: Swimsuit, Tomoe Koga
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, put them on the top of your deck in any order, choose up to 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to his or her hand. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 2 cards in your hand into your waiting room] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "All the Lies I Have for You" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock, and deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: D-Don't say that I'm cute!

name: Sudden Reunion, Tomoe Koga
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a level 0 or lower character revealed among those cards, this card's soul does not decrease by side attacking until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 during battle, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a level 0 or lower character, put it into your hand. (Otherwise, return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: Senpai!?

name: Laplace's Demon, Tomoe Koga
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in any order. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your 《Adolescence》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: So, what was it?

name: Indirectly Showing Off, Tomoe Koga
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Adolescence》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 When your other 《Adolescence》 character or this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may look at the top card of your deck. (Return the card you saw to its original place)
flavorText: Hello…

name: Scathing Words, Rio Futaba
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Adolescence》 characters, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Shrewd Brainiac" is in your climax area, search your deck for up to 1 《Adolescence》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: I mean, if you said hi to me, it would only make my skin crawl.

name: What Lies Ahead, Rio Futaba
text: 【CONT】 If your level is 2 or higher, this card gets the following ability: "【ACT】 [(1) Put 1 "Love's Frustrations, Rio Futaba" from your stage face up underneath this card as a marker] Choose up to 1 "Cool and Collected, Rio Futaba" in your waiting room, put it on the position that this card is on, put this card and all markers underneath this card face up in any order underneath that "Cool and Collected, Rio Futaba" as markers, choose up to 1 《Adolescence》 character in your waiting room, and return it into your hand."
flavorText: It was timing, in the end, I think.

name: Lost, Sakuta Azusagawa
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Adolescence》 characters get +500 power. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 character with "Shoko (翔子)" in its card name, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Is it okay to live my life like you do?

name: Two of Myself, Rio Futaba
text: 【CONT】 If your stock has 2 or less cards, this card cannot attack.
flavorText: There are two of me.

name: Honest Opinion, Shoko Makinohara
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have 2 or more other 《Adolescence》 characters, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Oh, I didn't mean anything by that.

name: Home Visit, Shoko Makinohara
text: 【CONT】 If the character facing this card is cost 0 or lower, this card cannot become 【REVERSE】.
flavorText: Good morning, Sakuta-san.

name: Parting in the Rain, Sakuta Azusagawa
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if you have another "Visiting the Sick, Tomoe Koga", this card gets +4000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Adolescence》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Visiting the Sick, Tomoe Koga" in your waiting room, and put it on any position on your stage.
flavorText: You're a high-school girl who fights for justice, right?

name: Memories That Remain, Shoko Makinohara
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more 《Adolescence》 characters, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Amongst the Pain in the Rain" is placed on your climax area, if this card is on your center stage, put up to 2 cards from the top of your deck into your stock.
flavorText: If her feelings weren't reaching you, then I feel sorry for her.

name: Visiting the Sick, Tomoe Koga
flavorText: It's against school rules to leave campus during class.

name: First Love's Reason
text: Choose 1 of your characters, and put it into your waiting room. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 climax, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Since I was feeling rather down back then.

name: Looping World
text: If you do not have a character with "Tomoe (朋絵)" in its card name, this card cannot be played from your hand. If all players are level 2 or lower, you may choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. If you do, shuffle your deck, and put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is level 1 or higher, you get 1 additional turn.
flavorText: Futaba: "The seven billion people in the human race, including me, doesn't think today is the third iteration."

name: All the Lies I Have for You
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)

name: Shrewd Brainiac
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 2 of your green characters, and those characters get +3000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.

name: Amongst the Pain in the Rain
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: Since I've arrived, everything will be all right.

name: Bunny Girl Senpai, Mai Sakurajima
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may reveal up to 3 cards from the top of your deck. If you revealed 1 or more cards, choose up to 1 《Adolescence》 character from among those cards, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may choose 1 "Irreplaceable Existence, Mai Sakurajima" in your waiting room, and put it into your memory.
flavorText: I'm surprised. So, you can still see me?

name: Sunset Sky, Kaede Azusagawa
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more 《Adolescence》 characters, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or lower, put it into your stock. (Otherwise, return the card to its original place. Climax are regarded as level 0) 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

name: Irreplaceable Existence, Mai Sakurajima
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or your memory, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, and deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the number of level 2 or higher cards revealed among those cards. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Damage may be canceled) 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "The World Without You" is in your climax area, you may deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled) 【AUTO】 When this card is frontal attacked, put this card in your memory. (Even though there is no battle opponent, the attack does not become a direct attack)
flavorText: I'll be scolded right there next to you.

name: Sunset Sky, Nodoka Toyohama
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【AUTO】 When a climax is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Girl Who Loves Her Big Brother, Kaede Azusagawa
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
flavorText: I-I'm Kaede Azusagawa…

name: Welcoming With Nasuno, Kaede Azusagawa
text: 【CONT】 This card cannot side attack. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Together With Nasuno" is in your climax area, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Schooling High School Idol, Nodoka Toyohama
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by a "Change" effect, draw 1 card, choose 1 card in your hand, put it into your waiting room, choose up to 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to his or her hand. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "A Sparkling Stage" is in your climax area, and you have another 《Adolescence》 character, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your opponent's deck, choose up to 4 cards from among them, put them into your opponent's waiting room, return the rest to your opponent's deck, your opponent shuffles his or her deck, and this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: All you need to think about is Big Sister.

name: Self-Loathing, Nodoka Toyohama
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's draw phase, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or higher, you may return this card to your hand. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: I really am sorry!

name: Paper-Thin Existence, Mai Sakurajima
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if you have 2 or more 《Adolescence》 characters, you may choose 1 "Irreplaceable Existence, Mai Sakurajima" in your waiting room, and put it into your memory. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1500, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that card gets +1500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: You're finally home.

name: Present?, Kaede Azusagawa
text: 【CONT】 Experience If the total level of cards in your level is 2 or higher, this card gets +1500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room]" .
flavorText: N-Not wearing this!

name: As a Lover, Mai Sakurajima
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 character in your waiting room with "Mai (麻衣)" or "Nodoka (のどか)" in its card name, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 2 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.

name: Rascal, Sakuta Azusagawa
text: 【CONT】 If your level is 2 or higher, this card gets the following ability. "【ACT】 [(2) Put 1 《Adolescence》 character from your hand into your waiting room & 【REST】 2 of your 《Adolescence》 characters] Choose 1 "Irreplaceable Existence, Mai Sakurajima" in your memory, and put it on any position of your stage." 【CONT】 During your turn, all of your other "Sunset Sky, Mai Sakurajima" and "Irreplaceable Existence, Mai Sakurajima" get +1000 power. 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500.
flavorText: I love you very, very, very, very, very much!

name: Runaway, Nodoka Toyohama
text: 【CONT】 This card cannot side attack. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your encore step, if this card is on your center stage, return this card to your hand, choose up to 1 level 0 or lower character in your hand, and put it on the position that this card was on as 【REST】.
flavorText: I'm going to live here, too.

name: Secret of Lost Memories, Nodoka Toyohama
text: 【CONT】 All your other "Secret of Lost Memories, Mai Sakurajima" get +1000 power. 【AUTO】 Bond/"Secret of Lost Memories, Mai Sakurajima" [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] (When this card is played and placed on the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Secret of Lost Memories, Mai Sakurajima" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Someone you know?

name: Emotions Escalating Quickly, Mai Sakurajima
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 0 or lower characters in front of this card get +1000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When your other 《Adolescence》 character is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: … Sure. I will.

name: An Adult's Charm, Mai Sakurajima
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if your opponent's waiting room has 5 or more climax, 【REST】 this card. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, put this card at the bottom of your deck.
flavorText: What time are you off? I'll wait for you.

name: Change of Clothes, Kaede Azusagawa
text: 【AUTO】 When your other "Fluffy Breakfast, Kaede Azusagawa" is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +5000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I've never worn anything like this, so it's embarrassing...

name: Fluffy Breakfast, Kaede Azusagawa
flavorText: Big Brother, this is delicious!

name: On Set, Mai Sakurajima
text: 【CONT】 This card cannot be chosen by your opponent's effects. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
flavorText: Why are you here, Sakuta?

name: Confidence to Face Tomorrow, Kaede Azusagawa
text: 【CONT】 This card cannot be chosen by your opponent's effects. 【CONT】 All your other 《Adolescence》 characters get +1000 power. 【ACT】 [【REST】 2 of your characters] Choose 1 card in your level and 1 card in your waiting room, and exchange them.
flavorText: Now, there is a feeling that it can be accomplished.

name: Scars
text: 【COUNTER】 Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may return this card to your hand."
flavorText: Sakuta: "A photo... One of the scar on my chest."

name: Feelings That Bind
text: Choose 1 "Irreplaceable Existence, Mai Sakurajima" in your memory, put it on any position of your stage, and that character gets +5000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Mai: "Now, which "hoshou" is the one for "Nobody is here to guarantee a future for Sakuta"?"

name: The World Without You
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Good night, Sakuta. Goodbye.

name: A Sparkling Stage
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Together With Nasuno
text: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect. (【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)

name: Girl Shrouded in Mystery, Shoko Makinohara
text: 【AUTO】 When a climax is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1 level and +500 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to 1 《Adolescence》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Oh, but I want to adopt that little one.

name: Petit Devil Kouhai, Tomoe Koga
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Adolescence》 characters you have ×500. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Returning World, Unreturned Feelings" is in your climax area, this card gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【AUTO】 When this card is frontal attacked, you may choose 1 of your other characters and this card, and return them to your hand."
flavorText: I hope you get to go out with Sakurajima-senpai.

name: Devilish Kouhai, Tomoe Koga
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《Adolescence》 characters in front of this card get +2000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your stock. 【ACT】 [(5)] If all players are level 3 or higher, all players put up to 4 cards from the top of their clock into their waiting room.
flavorText: I'll help you out, Senpai

name: Logical Witch, Rio Futaba
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Adolescence》 characters, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(3) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Adolescence Paradox" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【STAND】 this card.
flavorText: Well then, I'm going to put my socks on.

name: Unspoken Significance, Shoko Makinohara
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or at the bottom of your deck. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your 《Adolescence》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.

name: Love's Frustrations, Rio Futaba
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Adolescence》 characters get +500 power. 【ACT】 [(1)] Choose 1 level 0 or lower character on your opponent's center stage, and put it into his or her waiting room.
flavorText: I feel like I'm getting worse and worse.

name: Sunset Sky, Tomoe Koga
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Adolescence》 characters you have ×500.

name: Wholesome Middle School Student, Shoko Makinohara
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "Blue-Filled Vision" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +2500 power and the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【AUTO】 When this card is attacked, reveal the top card of your deck, put it on the top or at the bottom of your deck, and the character facing this card gets -X soul until end of turn. X is equal to the level of the revealed card." (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: Right, I'm an only child.

name: Study Session, Shoko Makinohara
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Adolescence》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: I'd be delighted to have what Kaede-san is having.

name: Corrupt Gaze, Tomoe Koga
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, and this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Adolescence》 characters revealed among those cards ×1000. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: You have a lewd look in your eyes.

name: Seized Present, Tomoe Koga
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or higher, put it into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (Otherwise, return it to its original place. Climax are regarded as level 0) 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is cost 0 or lower, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck.
flavorText: I like it. I like it a whole lot.

name: Basketball Club, Yuma Kunimi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if your stock has 3 or less cards, you may put that character on the top of your opponent's deck.

name: Classmate, Saki Kamisato
text: 【CONT】 If your deck has 5 or less cards, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 All your other "Basketball Club, Yuma Kunimi" get +2000 power. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Are you picking a fight?

name: Together with Hayate, Shoko Makinohara
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put that character at the bottom of his or her deck.
flavorText: There, there. Were you a good cat, Hayate?

name: Protective Shadow, Rio Futaba
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, all of your other "Basketball Club, Yuma Kunimi" get +2000 power. 【AUTO】 Bond/"Basketball Club, Yuma Kunimi" [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is played and placed on the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Basketball Club, Yuma Kunimi" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: I am cheering for him.

name: Study Session, Rio Futaba
text: 【ACT】 [(1)] This card gets +1 soul and +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Oh, yes. Thank you.

name: Unconditional Support, Shoko Makinohara
text: 【AUTO】 During this card's battle, when the damage you received is not canceled, put this card into your waiting room.

name: Roundabout Solution, Sakuta Azusagawa
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 "Back From Shopping, Rio Futaba" in your waiting room, and put it into your stock.
flavorText: So I'm bored, and thought to spend some leisurely time with you.

name: Responding Unenthusiastically, Rio Futaba
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if you have an 《Adolescence》 character, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: What is it, Azusagawa?

name: Mind-Reader? Tomoe Koga
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other《Adolescence》 characters.
flavorText: Senpai, you can read minds or sometin'?

name: Nasuno and Hayate
text: Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Adolescence》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Adolescence Paradox
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Returning World, Unreturned Feelings
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)
flavorText: It's unfair to put it that way!

name: Blue-Filled Vision
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Did you know?

name: SD Nodoka Toyohama
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to the character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your other characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Nothing less from you, Sakuta. What a rascal.

name: SD Kaede Azusagawa
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or higher, this card gets +1 soul until end of turn. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your other 《Adolescence》 characters, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Nothing less from you, Big Brother. Such a rascal.

name: SD Tomoe Koga
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Return 2 characters from your waiting room into your deck & Shuffle your deck] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Nothing less from you, Senpai. What a rascal.

name: SD Mai Sakurajima
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 cost 0 or lower 《Adolescence》 character in your waiting room with level equal to or lower than your level, and put it on any position of your stage.
flavorText: As expected of you, Sakuta. You're such a rascal.

name: SD Rio Futaba
text: 【CONT】 If you have 1 or less other characters, all of your other characters get +1500 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if your opponent's center stage has 1 or less characters, choose 1 cost 0 or lower character on your opponent's center stage, and put it at the bottom of his or her deck.
flavorText: Nothing less from you, Azusagawa. Such a rascal.

name: SD Shoko Makinohara
text: 【AUTO】 When your other 《Adolescence》 character attacks, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: As expected of you, Sakuta-san. You're such a rascal.

name: Seductive Proposal, Mai Sakurajima
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Adolescence》 characters you have ×1000. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card's level 2 or higher battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Hey, why don't we kiss?

name: Summertime Memories, Mai Sakurajima
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Adolescence》 character from your hand into your clock] When this card is placed on stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Autumn Visit, Mai Sakurajima
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another 《Adolescence》 character, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in any order.

name: Cruel Hypothesis, Rio Futaba
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is an 《Adolescence》 character, put it into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (Otherwise, return it to its original position) 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, draw 1 card.

name: Self-Introduction, Shoko Makinohara
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your 《Adolescence》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is an 《Adolescence》 character, put it into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (Otherwise, return it to its original position)
flavorText: My name is Shoko Makinohara.

name: Sudden Assault, Tomoe Koga
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your 《Adolescence》 characters, and that character gets +1 level and +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Now's your chance! Run!

name: Call During Wee Hours, Rio Futaba
text: 【AUTO】 When your other 《Adolescence》 character attacks, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: What time do you think it is?

name: Hidden Feelings, Rio Futaba
text: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Are you an idiot!? You must be an idiot!

name: Impactful Words, Tomoe Koga
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Adolescence》 characters.

name: Unnamed Letter, Rio Futaba
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Adolescence》 characters. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
flavorText: See ya. I definitely handed it to you.

name: An Extraordinary Theory
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: You can't be conscious of other people while you're sleeping, after all.

name: Misunderstanding
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.
flavorText: Go ahead and kick. That way, we'll be even.

name: Unreliable Smile, Kaede Azusagawa
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your 《Adolescence》 characters, and that character gets +500 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.
flavorText: Sure!

name: Enroute to School, Sakuta Azusagawa
text: 【CONT】 All of your other "Unexpected Reply, Mai Sakurajima" get +2000 power. 【AUTO】 Bond/"Unexpected Reply, Mai Sakurajima" [Put 1 card in from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Unexpected Reply, Mai Sakurajima" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Hey, Kunimi…

name: Popular Talent, Mai Sakurajima
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: I'm Mai Sakurajima.

name: Building Trust, Nodoka Toyohama
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 1 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
flavorText: I think I understand it a bit now.

name: Judging Stare, Mai Sakurajima
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if "Heart-to-Heart Talk" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, all of your other characters get the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand."
flavorText: Sakuta doesn't deserve more than just "Sakuta."

name: Sudden Move, Nodoka Toyohama
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +1000 power. 【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 this card] Search your deck for up to 1 《Adolescence》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Sakuta: "Why are you here, Toyohama?"

name: Big Misunderstanding, Kaede Azusagawa
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Adolescence》 characters, this card gets +2000 power.
flavorText: Then, is she making you buy a vase?

name: Unexpected Reply, Mai Sakurajima
flavorText: Thanks.

name: Ephemeral Existence, Mai Sakurajima
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to X cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of 《Adolescence》 characters you have. 【AUTO】 [(2) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 5 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)

name: Bitter Memories
text: If you do not have any 《Adolescence》 characters, this card cannot be played from your hand. Choose 1 level 2 or higher character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: I forced myself to smile…

name: Heart-to-Heart Talk
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Sakuta: "Because it's hard to be in trouble when you don't have anyone to rely on."
